<title level="1" right="Rules">[Uneven Ground](/Rules.aspx?ID=456)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 476 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Uneven ground is an area unsteady enough that you need to Balance (see [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1)) or risk falling prone and possibly injuring yourself, depending on the specifics of the uneven ground. You are flat-footed on uneven ground. Each time you are hit by an attack or fail a save on uneven ground, you must succeed at a Reflex save (with the same DC as the Acrobatics check to Balance) or fall prone.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
